actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the provisions which include unemployment compensation in gross income.
short_title: Tax Relief for the Unemployed Act

summary.text: Tax Relief for the Unemployed Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to repeal the inclusion in gross income of unemployment compensation.

titles.title: Tax Relief for the Unemployed Act
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the provisions which include unemployment compensation in gross income.
